in-progress.title: OVERALL - COMPLETE WEBSITE
in-progress.description: Create a website to showcase my various experience and demonstrate acquired knowledge.
criteria: Create a landing page to display my summary.
Add a page section to share information about me.
Add a page section to allow someone to contact me through e-mail.
Add a page section to showcase some of my projects (only requires base logic, not extended project data through JSON).
Add styling to various components of the page.

in-progress.title: OVERALL - COMPLETE WEBSITE
in-progress.description: Create a website to display my current progress on all projects.
criteria: Create an application which reads from a JSON file and displays projects and individual tasks under relevant columns.
Create a private application which allows the addition, editing, and removal of tasks from the board.
